Name: The Slime
About the game: Solving 2D platform puzzles, watching stories. You can control the character to enter the door, and move the box and slime to go where you can't go. Magic can be used to break or freeze, illuminate dark spots, manipulate robots, and find new ways. You can see the story of the character who left in search of survivors.
